name: Third Rock Techkno
tagline: Angular | NodeJS | IONIC | ReactJS | React Native
description:
Third Rock Techkno is an emerging team of innovative and agile professionals with international exposure in web development and mobile apps development. We have been delivering innovative web and mobile solutions by circumventing the standard conventions and protocols to create a product that provides a better experience to the users.
We stay updated with not only the technological trends but also invest in understanding the user demands and collecting user feedback, so as to create a product that is technologically superior and has Incorporated well-tested user feedback, in turn, increasing the chance of market adaptability.
 
From start itself, we have been inclined towards the use of the advanced versatile technology and Specializing in Angular, NodeJS, IONIC, ReactJS, React Native, AR Kit, AR Core, Unity 3D and Designing technologies like Sass. We also specialize in voice application development using Alexa Skills and Google Actions.
Third Rock Tehckno has mastered the concept of SaaS( Software as a Service) model to bring the best value for the client, Offering us the chance to work for the hugely interacted sectors Healthcare, Staffing & Billing, Travell & Hospitality, Real estate, and BPMN.  
"The difference between something good and something great is attention to detail."  - Charles R. Swindoll
We have successfully achieved
120+ Projects completed
35+ Clients (The USA, UK, Europe, Australia, and Norway)
40+ team size
READ MORE...
